attributes.action: Reward the British divers involved in the rescue of the youngsters in Thailand.
attributes.background: The British cave divers voluntarily assisted with the rescue of children in caves in Thailand risking their own lives and should be publically rewarded by the government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
